styles.name: Photorealistic
styles.description: Highly detailed, realistic images that look like photographs
styles.prompt: photorealistic, highly detailed, sharp focus, 8k resolution, professional photography

styles.name: Cinematic
styles.description: Scenes with dramatic lighting and composition like in movies
styles.prompt: cinematic, dramatic lighting, movie scene, film grain, wide angle shot, depth of field

styles.name: Portrait Photography
styles.prompt: professional portrait photography, studio lighting, bokeh, sharp focus on subject, high resolution

styles.name: Landscape Photography
styles.prompt: landscape photography, golden hour, wide angle, panoramic view, HDR, vivid colors

styles.name: Abstract Art
styles.description: Non-representational art with shapes, colors and textures
styles.prompt: abstract art, non-representational, vibrant colors, geometric shapes, textured

styles.name: Oil Painting
styles.prompt: oil painting, traditional, detailed brushwork, textured canvas, rich colors

styles.name: Watercolor
styles.prompt: watercolor painting, soft colors, wet-on-wet technique, flowing, transparent

styles.name: 3D Render
styles.prompt: 3D render, CGI, octane render, highly detailed, volumetric lighting, ray tracing

styles.name: Pixel Art
styles.description: Retro-style pixel art like old video games
styles.prompt: pixel art, 16-bit, retro game style, limited color palette, pixelated

styles.name: Anime
styles.prompt: anime style, cel shaded, vibrant colors, distinctive eyes, clean lines
